about.content: Front-End Developer, graduated from Laboratora. Interested in create, innovate and improve technological projects; Committed to my work and responsibilities, I believe in the continuous evolution of learning and in teamwork. Among the soft skills I can offer are empathy, teamwork, honesty and proactivity.

projects.title: Projects
projects.contentdata: The purpose of this product is to facilitate access to female demographic information, which NGOs use for social services planning in Mexico, Peru, Chile and Brazil. Show graphs and statistics.
projects.contentsocial: Social Learning is an application designed as a Social Network to share information about Web Development, among students, professionals or academics. It allows to post, edit and delete messages.
projects.contentmd: The purpose of this library is to validate the links found in a .md file or files and obtain statistics from them. The installation is done with the npm mdlink-sogcm command through the terminal.
